p: To confirm the apoptotic effect of spirooxindole 6a in HepG2 cells, Annexin-V FTIC/PI dual staining assay was carried out at IC 50 of 6a (6.9 µM). Examining the results of this flow cytometric analysis ( Figure 4), revealed that HepG2 cells treated with spirooxindole 6a exhibited a significant increase in the percentage of annexin-V positive cells indicating an early (lower right quadrant) and late (upper right quadrant) apoptosis from 0.95% to 6.76%, and from 0.33% to 14.14%, respectively, which comprises about 16.3-folds total increase with respect to control ( Figure 4).
